item.title: JU eezy
item.description: Problems solved Following are the features of the JU eezy app : Homepage that looks promising Everyday help available at your fingertips Campus Guide View entire floor map of any building Search across the campus You can easily search indoor location of any classroom, lab, office etc. Search by Faculty's name Get faculty cabin's location by searching with faculty's name Room description View alternate names, faculty details etc.

item.title: LocatIN
item.description:
What we do? We solve the problem of building fast, lightweight and easy to use indoor map solution for large infrastructures. We are eagerly looking for customers. If you want your venue to be digitalized, contact us now! We will build a Unique NextGen Indoor map solution for your campus. We are an incubated start-up @ JECRC Incubation center, JECRC University.
Videos Introductory video LocatIN for university Big Picture

item.title: Karobar Easy
item.description: Major features of the app Mark Attendance Owner can mark attendance, view check-in check-out times of all staffs at one place. Monthly Attendance Owner can view individual monthly attendance of all staffs. Location Tracking Owner can track location of each staff at once. He can also view location history of the time interval he wants. Location tracking filter While location tracking, owner can filter staffs based on their designation.

item.title: Byaaz Book
item.description: Major features of the app are : Interest Calculator You can calculate the interest in two different ways i.e. Simple Interest and Compound interest, based on your preference. Backup & Restore You can backup your whole data of customers and their transactions, with just one click. Byaaj Book gives you the flexibility to restore the whole content of the app. Fully Dynamic You can edit the customers, bills, and transactions, by long tapping on them.

item.title: Ambika Parts
item.description: Ambika Parts consists of 2 apps, one for users and one for Admin. User app Following are the major features of the user app : Slideshow on Main page Using slideshow, admin can notiy his users of Main service or Information/Notice that he wants to deliver Shop Status & Timing Users can check whether the shop is closed or open and how much time is left to open/close Lottery System To increase user Engagement this app provides weekly Lottery Lottery System Users get notified of new lottery Coin system To increase sales, this app provides virtual coins on offline shopping which indeed gives prize Showcase Gallery This feature helps owner to show important items to their users document.

item.title: VFresh
item.description: Admin app Features of Admin app : Powerful Admin app provides all the powers in a single app Manage Categories Admin can organize item in categories. Categories are fully dynamic and can be edited anytime, anywhere. Sub categories Within a category, there can be any number of sub categories Product Management Admin can manage products within the app Add/Edit product Admin can add/edit products.

item.title: Smart Gaya
item.description:
This video shows how the app functions:
User app Following are the major features of the user app : All service at your fingertips You can order any service you want, from salon, carpenter, AC Services, WiFi provider, Painters, Tutor, RO service, Plumber, CCTV, Driver, Accounts and many more Gaya Tour It helps users find cool and chilling Place from temples to bars.

item.title: Food Bazaar
item.description: Shopkeeper app Features of Shopkeeper app : Dynamic Shopkeeper can edit menu, working hours, promocodes etc. anytime Order management Shopkeeper can manage orders and filter them by date document.addEventListener( 'DOMContentLoaded', function () { new Splide( '#slider1' , { padding : 0 , type : "loop" , rewind : true , lazyLoad: 'nearby' }).mount(); } ); User app Features of User app :

item.title: Blushed
item.description: This was a project we developed from scratch during an internship. The app UI has evolved after that. But still the core logic is written by us. The new app looks as follows. Features Top Stories View the latest and popular stories on top Categries Browse through various categories Dark Mode Read in bed without hurting your eyes Filter Filter stories based on language you prefer Autoplay Messages can be shown in an hands-free autoplay mode Unique options panel From options, one can toggle sound effects, read description of story or delete progress Likes & Bookmarks Like & bookmark your favourite stories Guide The app helps you understand the UI/UX Track progress Easily see how much you've read Shimmer effect Beautiful Shimmer animation for loading data Swipe to remove Easily remove stories from Bookmarks, Likes by swiping document.

item.title: TC
item.description:
TC is a full fledged e-Shopping app. We challenged ourselves to build an ecom system. The biggest challenge in the ecom system is to keep multiple apps (Admin & User) in sync.
Features Following are the major features of the Tirupati Collection app : Browse sarees like a pro User can browse sarees by their Fabric & Type Catalags Browse sarees from a variety of catalogs Multiple images/portfolio View multiple images/portfolio for a single saree Zoom User can zoom and view images/portfolio in full screen mode Search Search by saree, fabric, type & catalog Maintain profile Save profile for faster checkout Order management Easily manage orders.

item.title: About us
item.description:
The Streamliners is a community of Problem Solvers. We solve Real-World problems. We encourage how to solve. We guide, help, mentor how to solve. Our motto - Deployment of skill or talent you have, in Real-life is important.
Lavish Swarnkar Founder & CEO A passionate programmer & Android Developer Deepak Choudhary Managing Director & Co-founder Heart of the organization

item.title: CSE Simplified
item.description: CSE Simplified is a video series made for B.Tech CSE students. We have tried to cover all those topics that a CSE student is worried about. We have also cleared some misconceptions of students. Watch now! Trailer EP01 : The true CSE path EP02 : Which language should I learn? | Why learn C++ and Java? EP03 : CSE Subject Hierarchy

item.title: JU eezy Archive
item.description: JUFM (JU eezy v0.1) JU Food Menu This version was not released globally. Work on JU eezy started in March 2018. Following build was completed in just 3 days. Mess Food Menu This was the feature to be implemented Drawer Back then, that's how simple app was! Mess Admin Mess Admin used to upload menu from here document.

item.title: NAAD Pricing Plan
item.description: High Standards Protect you from Low Quality Experiences. .blockquote-custom { position: relative; font-size: 1.1rem; margin-bottom: 50px; margin-top: 50px; } .blockquote-custom-icon { width: 50px; height: 50px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; position: absolute; top: -25px; left: 50px; } Only Videos won’t work We have seen people learning App Development through videos. And it’s terrible, they get stuck in between, no one to help, no one to give feedback and improve what they have built.

item.title: Native Android App Development (NAAD) Training
item.description:
We provide extensive training in Android. We guide, mentor and help students learn Android App development to solve Real-world problems.
Course structure Recorded videos on YouTube (FREE) LIVE Doubts clearing sessions Handcrafted assignments Feedback & suggestions on Assignments Guidance & help in personal projects Team & opportunity to work on Real-world projects with the team Duration : 4 - 8 weeks APPLY NOW

item.title: Native Android App Development (NAAD) Training
item.description:
We provide extensive training in Android. We guide, mentor and help students become self-sustaining & self-employed Software Engineers (SWE).
Our definition of Software Engineer Our definition and qualification of Software Engineer is different. By making you a SWE, we do not mean to make you employable for SWE in FAANG. Instead we speak of it with a much broader perspective. We believe CSE is meant to apply CS skills to solve real world problems by building solutions.

item.title: Other Apps
item.description: Smart Podium Smart Podium is an IOT based app used to control electrical appliances in the classroom. We developed this app during JU Rhythm Hackathon 2019. We WON the Hackathon. Along with the powerful backend & APIs, the app stood up because of its UI & animations. Have a look : Download the dummy app here and see the animations yourself.
